  Hot Topics

  • Town Council Workshop Goals & Priorities Presentation

    Town Council conducted its annual 2 day strategic planning workshop to develop key priorities for the upcoming year for council. View presentation...

  • US 278 Gateway Corridor Improvements

    The SC Department of Transportation (SCDOT) is proposing to make improvements to the US 278 corridor between Bluffton and Hilton Head Island. more information...

  • Hilton Head Island - Our Plan

    Our Plan, the current initiative, links the efforts completed in the Our Future Vision to the new comprehensive plan for Hilton Head Island. more information...

  • Workforce Housing Project

    Hilton Head Island is a great place to live, work and raise a family. Having appropriate workforce housing is important for ensuring the prosperity of residents. more information...

  Announcements

  • Insurance Services Office Public Protection Rating Upgrade for The Hilton Head Island Fire Rescue

    Hilton Head Island Fire Rescue recently received the Insurance Services Office (ISO) rating of Class 2. Learn more...

  News and Media Releases

  • Hilton Head Island, South Carolina Featured Across North America in Business View Magazine - 3/29/2019

  • Town of Hilton Head Island Consultant to Share Recommendations for Preserving Gullah Geechee Culture and Neighborhoods - 3/27/2019
